name: Solitaire Ocean
description:
Play Solitaire to decorate your dream aquarium for adorable fish!

It's a new way to Solitaire Klondike! Welcome to Solitaire Ocean by LinkDesks

Features of Solitaire Ocean：
• Offline game, you can enjoy it anywhere you want without wifi
• Single player card game, perfect for when you're on your own
• Brain game, it will exercises logical and observation effectively
• Relaxing game, no time limit, you can play it at your own pace
• Free game, daily rewards free coins make your game more fun
• Decoration game, variety of unique aquariums and individual fish
• The best choice to kill time with infinite levels and rich content

Ocean Solitaire has the same rules as Classic Klondike Solitaire, so you can master it quickly and easily!
There is no reason to reject it, so come and enjoy it now!

Any feedbacks to Solitaire Ocean - Classic Klondike free games please contact:
